sentence: It is true that Republican strategists are sweating the winner of the GOP gubernatorial primary, Doug Mastriano, who tends to be more loudmouthed about his insurrectionist views than other Republican candidates.
author: Amanda Marcotte
title: Less Madison Cawthorn, more dumpy fascists in bad suits: Republicans embrace covert Big Liars

sentence: It is true that Republican strategists are sweating the winner of the GOP gubernatorial primary, Doug Mastriano, who tends to be more loudmouthed about his insurrectionist views than other Republican candidates.
author: Amanda Marcotte
title: GOP drops the flash but keeps the fascism
